extendedInfo.description: XBStatus is an application with the sole purpose of providing access to the XBOX Live content on XBOX.com.NOTE: This is *only* a dedicated, embedded browser. You can achieve the same functionality by bookmarking the site in your web browser of choice. The app exists only to simplify access to the content available on the web.XBStatus is, and always will be, free from developer-embedded ads. I see no purpose in charging people for a "paid" version of so basic an application.Planned additions: + Logout button (the mobile site doesn't appear to have a simple logout option)-----------------------------------------Microsoft, Xbox, Xbox Live, the Xbox logos, and/or other Microsoft products referenced herein are either trademarks or registered trademarks of Microsoft Corporation.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Just what I needed. A quick look at my Xbox Live friends without having to login every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just wat i needed
reviews.comment: This is a great onto go xbox 360 app,think u should try downloading this app if u have an live account get this out of all 360 live apps please try      \\    /       \' \'
